# statusBarManager

**Instance Property**

The current configuration of the status bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var statusBarManager: UIStatusBarManager? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this object to get details about the status bar, such as whether it’s hidden.

## Getting the status bar configuration

- **UIStatusBarManager**: An object that describes the configuration of the status bar.
